üìú About me

I am currently looking for an internship from 09/22 to 04/23!

Hi, I'm Nikkel, currently studying in my sixth semester towards my Bachelor's Degree in IT-Systems Engineering at the Hasso-Plattner-Institute in Potsdam.
I'm always open to learn and try out new things, but am especially interested in Machine Learning, CI/CD and everything that makes workflows more efficient!

In 2014 my family and I moved from my hometown of Kiel, Germany to Varese in northern Italy, where I lived until my graduation from the European School of Varese in Summer 2019. In 2017 I had the opportunity to take an internship in San Francisco, California, where I learnt a lot about the "Silicon Valley Mindset" and a new way of working collaboratively. In 2019 I started studying for my Bachelor's degree in IT-Systems Engineering at the Hasso-Plattner-Institute in Potsdam, Germany, which I intend to finish in Summer 2023.

I am currently writing my bachelor's thesis "Monitoring Reliability and Robustness of Agents for Dynamic Pricing in different (Re-)Commerce Markets", which is based on my bachelor's project run in cooperation with SAP Feather, "Online Marketplace Simulation: A Testbed for Self-Learning Agents", which I am working on together with a small group of other students.

Visit me on Github

üíª Projects

üåê The Portfolio website

I started this portfolio website in early April 2022, after I had gained some first Web-Development experience during my studies. To challenge myself and to allow for as much creativity as possible, I decided to use three.js for the project, as this would allow me to revisit my knowledge of 3D-Computergraphics, which I had last involved myself with two years prior. The website is hosted using Github pages, and its source code can be found in this repository.

üìñ Experience - Internships

Enterprise Garage Consultancy, California - Summer 2017

Over the course of this Student internship I was coached by the companies Founder & CEO, Mario Herger. Together, we welcomed delegations from German companies to learn about the "Silicon Valley Mindset", and how they could transform their company's culture to become more open-minded and diverse. To achieve this, we visited personalities from the Silicon Valley's Tech-Start-Up scene to talk about what makes working in the SF Bay Area different.
An additional task of mine was to assist in planning, conducting and editing Interviews with Engineers from both Tesla and Liquid Motors about the way the Automobile industry is changing to become more environmentally conscious.

NDR (Norther German Broadcasting) - Summer 2018

During this internship, which I organized out of curiosity, I was able to get to know the inner workings of one of Germany's biggest public broadcasting companies. My main tasks were helping with the complete workflow of reports for the evening news, from planning over filming to editing, but I was also able to get to know how different live-TV formats get produced.
